Andrew James Clutterbuck
known professionally as Andrew Lincoln, is an English actor. His first major role was as the character Egg in the BBC drama This Life. Lincoln later portrayed Simon Casey in the Channel 4 sitcom Teachers,Mark in the Christmas-themed romantic comedy film Love Actually and Dr. Robert Bridge in the ITV television series Afterlife Beginning in 2010, Lincoln gained recognition for his portrayal of Rick Grimes, the lead character on the AMC post-apocalyptic horror television series The Walking Dead.
